data.title: Achievements of the Argentine national football team
data.meta_description: Explore Argentina's football dominance with 3 FIFA World Cup titles, 16 Copa America victories, 2 Olympic golds, and more.
data.text:
Argentina are one of international football’s most successful teams with numerous titles and many high-profile victories.

Armed with legendary players such as Diego Maradona and Lionel Messi, the South American nation have certainly made their presence felt at many tournaments.

Here, we look at the achievements of the Argentina national team.

FIFA World Cup Titles

Argentina have won the FIFA World Cup three times

Winners – 1978

Winners – 1982

Winners – 2022

Copa America Titles

Argentina are 16 times winners of the Copa America, a record achievement.

Winners – 1921

Winners – 1925

Winners – 1927

Winners – 1929

Winners – 1937

Winners – 1941

Winners – 1945

Winners – 1946

Winners – 1947

Winners – 1955

Winners – 1957

Winners – 1959

Winners – 1991

Winners – 1993

Winners – 2021

Winners – 2024

Olympic Gold Medals

Argentina have two gold medals at the Olympic Games.

Winners – 2004

Winners – 2008

FIFA Confederations Cup

Argentina have won the Confederations Cup on one occasion.

Winners – 1993

Other Major International Titles

Argentina are winners of other small competitions such as the CONMEBOL–UEFA Cup of Champions but their bigger milestones have been celebrated more.

Historical Milestones

Although the holders of the World Cup on three occasions, Argentina still trail overall to Brazil, Germany, and Italy.

Closer to home in South America, Argentina are more dominant as they hold the most Copa America titles with 16 crowns.

Iconic Players and Coaches

Diego Maradona and Lionel Messi have both fired Argentina to World Cup glory and the pair are seen as two of the greatest footballers of all time.

César Menotti, Carlos Bilardo, and Lionel Scaloni are the three men who’ve won the World Cup as Argentina manager and their accomplishments have filled their nation with pride.

What are Fan Tokens

A Socios.com Fan Token is a digital asset that transforms your passion into rewards. As a Fan Token holder, you have the potential to access once-in-a-lifetime experiences, exclusive benefits, and other perks for being what you’ve always been – a passionate fan. Fan Tokens empower you to vote in official team polls, predict results, check-in for games, play games, choose your favourite players and more while generating reward points that lead to extraordinary Fan Rewards.

Fan Tokens Holder Benefits & Rewards

Fan Tokens empower you to reward your passion. Think of unique, once-in-a-lifetime experiences like meeting the players, re-creating classic goals or even being a part of matchday in novel and exciting ways.

You can win matchday tickets, VIP seats, behind-the-scenes access and more with your Fan Tokens.
